DOC.brief_summary: To determine respiratory support birth guide RFM decrease BPD .
DOC.detailed_description: Despite recent advance perinatal-neonatal care , increase trend bronchopulmonary dysplasia ( BPD ) among survivor prematurity1 . Most infant develop BPD born prematurely , 75 % affected baby weigh less 1000g birth2 . The risk develop BPD increase decrease birth weight report incidence high 85 % neonate weigh 500g 699g , 5 % infant birth weight 1500g2 . Alberta high rate ( 10 % ) delivering premature infants Canada . In Edmonton approximately 200 premature infant < 1250 g birth weight bear annually 50 % develop BPD . This put heavy burden health resource since infant require frequent hospital re-admission first two year birth , even adolescent persistent respiratory symptom . Hypothesis Preterm infant < 33 week gestation require breathe support birth , delivery SIs ( SI group ) mask ventilation compare standard mask ventilation ( IPPV group ) reduce incidence BPD . Aim To determine respiratory support birth initial sustain inflation compare IPPV decrease BPD . Study population Entry criterion Infants < 33 week gestation bear Royal Alexandra Hospital require respiratory support resuscitation delivery room . Exclusion criteria Infants exclude congenital abnormality condition might adverse effect breathe ventilation , e.g . congenital pulmonary airway anomaly , congenital diaphragmatic hernia , congenital heart disease require intervention neonatal period . Infants also exclude parent refuse give consent study . Description intervention `` SI group '' Infants randomize `` SI group '' receive two initial sustain inflation PPV CPAP . `` IPPV group '' Infants randomize `` IPPV group '' receive mask IPPV initial PIP 20 cmH2O PEEP 5 cm H2O , ventilation rate 40-60 inflations/min spontaneously breathe , time CPAP provide . `` Failed SI IPPV '' Babies fail improve remain apneic , bradycardic hypoxemic despite two SIs and/or 30 second effective IPPV require alternative airway . Unit policy also dictate elective intubation instillation surfactant , despite CPAP , preterm infant continue increase work breathe require sustain inspiratory oxygen concentration 40 % .
